highlights: Core member of the core React Native platform team, responsible for the development, maintenance, and enhancement of Entain's mobile applications.

Led the creation of Entain's design system from scratch, collaborating with the design team to establish visual and interaction guidelines, resulting in a consistent user experience across all products.
Implemented various features and projects using React Native, improving overall application performance.
Fostered strong collaboration with cross-functional teams, including product management, design, and QA, to ensure the delivery of high-quality, reliable, and user-friendly mobile applications.
Led the migration of our Tab NZ Brand a major project and multi million dollar deal
Developed and maintained scalable web applications, utilizing Vue.js, Golang, and other cutting-edge technologies.
Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and adaptability by quickly learning and implementing new technologies, contributing to the successful launch of three major projects during the tenure.
Participated in agile development methodologies, including daily stand-ups and sprint planning, ensuring timely delivery of features and efficient resource allocation.
Streamlined the development process by actively participating in code reviews and sharing best practices, reducing bug count.
